name: The Worst Escape Game Ever
description:
Yeah so this is my first game ever released if you ask why this game is so bad. I will release more games if I learn unity well. Now I don't know almost nothing about programming. I promise better results in the future!!!11

This game has the worst graphics Possible!!!

This game has no audio bcz I was too lazy ;(((

If you want to help me making more games, you can support me by donating (a part of the money'll go for website host).

Controls:

------------------------------------

A = Move left

D = Move Right

Space = Jump

i  = Reset the level

Escape = Exit the game

------------------------------------

What to do:

So you have a map with a controlable player where you can jump between houses. You also have 2  friends: Amogus and a Camel (its pretty hard to see him because he has a very high speed, that's why i dont have a screenshot of him) which will try to confuse or help you.

AND WE ALSO HAVE A TOYOTA COROLLA BOYSSSSSSSS (Yes it is that pink car)

This game has not an ending ahahahhaha.

How to install the game:

-----------------------------------------------------

1. Download the file

2. Make a folder anywhere you want

3.Extract the filles into the folder.

4. Enjoy (idk if it's enjoyable but ENJOY ) !

-----------------------------------------------------
